techmeme.title: X reverts its water pistol emoji back to a firearm on the web, after Twitter originally switched the pistol emoji from a realistic-looking handgun in 2018 (Keith Broni/Emojipedia)
Meta says it will allow developers to use the outputs from Llama models, including Llama 3.1 405B, to improve other models for the first time (Benj Edwards/Ars Technica)
Elon Musk says "I am not donating $45M a month to Trump", but states he created American PAC to support Trump, without revealing how much he will donate (Eva Roytburg/Fortune)
Level AI, maker of AI-powered tools to automate customer service tasks, raised a $39.4M Series C led by Adams Street Partners, taking its total raised to $73.1M (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Sources: Samsung's HBM3 chips have been cleared by Nvidia for use in its H20 GPU, developed for the Chinese market; HBM3E chips are still being tested (Reuters)
